get.description:
List all users!

Permission= Loginned user
- Normal users can't list staff or admin users
- Staff users can't list admin users

Token endpoint is hidden

You can send query with endpoint for filter[],search[], sort[], page and limit.
    Examples:
  • URL/?filter[field1]=value1&filter[field2]=value2
  • URL/?search[field1]=value1&search[field2]=value2
  • URL/?sort[field1]=1&sort[field2]=-1
  • URL/?page=2&limit=1

post.description:
create a new user!

Permission= No Permission
- Admin or staff or in-active users can be create.d just by admin users

- Password type Rules- [lenght:8-16, at least: 1 upper, 1 lower, 1 number, 1 special[@$!%*?&]]
- Email type Rules- --@--.--
- Required fields: - username, email, password, firstName, lastName

400.description: Bad request - username,email,password, firstName, lastName fields are required!

get.description:
Get a user by id!!

Permission= Loginned user
- Admin can list all users!
- Staff user can list all users except admin users!
- Normal user can list all users except admin or staff users!

400.description: Bad request - Invalid id type(ObjectId)!

500.description: Something went wrong! - asked record is found, but it couldn't be updated!

put.description:
Update a User by id!

Permission= Normal user
- Admin users can be update.d just by admin users
- Other users can update theirselves
- Admin, staff or active modifications are accessible for just the admin users!

- Password type Rules- [lenght:8-16, at least: 1 upper, 1 lower, 1 number, 1 special[@$!%*?&]]
- Email type Rules- --@--.--
- Required fields: - username,email,password

400.description: Bad request    </br>- Invalid id type(ObjectId)!   </br>- username, email, password, firstName, lastName fields are required!   </br>- non-admin users can't modify other users!

500.description: Something went wrong! - asked record is found, but it couldn't be updated!

delete.description:
Delete a user by id!!

Permission= Admin user
- Admin can delete all users!
- Other users can't delete any user!

400.description: Bad request - Invalid id type(ObjectId)!

500.description: Something went wrong! - asked record is found, but it couldn't be updated!

patch.description:
Partial Update a User by id!

Permission= Normal user
- Admin users can be update.d just by admin users
- Other users can update theirselves
- Admin, staff or active modifications are accessible for just the admin users!

- Password type Rules- [lenght:8-16, at least: 1 upper, 1 lower, 1 number, 1 special[@$!%*?&]]
- Email type Rules- --@--.--
- Required fields: - Aat least one of the username, email, password, firstName, lastName, isActive, isAdmin, isStaff fields is required!

400.description: Bad request    </br>- Invalid id type(ObjectId)!   </br>- At least one field of username, email, password, firstName, lastName,isActive,isAdmin,isStaff fields is required!   </br>- non-admin users can't modify other users!

500.description: Something went wrong! - asked record is found, but it couldn't be updated!

post.description:
Login with username/email and password!

Permission= No Permission

- Password type Rules- [lenght:8-16, at least: 1 upper, 1 lower, 1 number, 1 special[@$!%*?&]]
- Email type Rules- --@--.--
- Required fields: - username or email,password

400.description: Bad request - email or username and password fields are required!

401.description: Unauthorized:    </br>- User not found!   </br>- Your account is not active - please contact with support!   </br>- Invalid password!

post.description:
Refresh the access token with refresh token!

Permission= No Permission

- Required fields: - bearer. refresh Token

400.description: Bad request - bearer.refreshToken is a required field!

401.description: Unauthorized:    </br>- Unauhtorized - Invalid signature - invalid token or token is expired!!   </br>- Unauhtorized - Your account is not active - please contact with support!!!   </br>- User not found!   </br>- Invalid password!

get.description:
Logout with with token or with out token!

Permission= No Permission

List all firms!

Permission= Loginned user

You can send query with endpoint for filter[],search[], sort[], page and limit.
    Examples:
  • URL/?filter[field1]=value1&filter[field2]=value2
  • URL/?search[field1]=value1&search[field2]=value2
  • URL/?sort[field1]=1&sort[field2]=-1
  • URL/?page=2&limit=1

post.description:
Create a new firm!

Permission= Loginned User
- Firm name should have a unique value
- name field Max Length:100
- Phone field: String, Max Length:11, [0-9]
- address field Max Length:200
- Image field Max length : 1000, should match: http:// or https://

400.description: Bad request - name, phone, address, image fields are required!

get.description:
Get a firm by id!

Permission= Loginned User

400.description: Bad request - Invalid param id type(ObjectId)!!

put.description:
Update a new firm by id!

Permission= Loginned User
- Firm name should have a unique value
- name field Max Length:100
- Phone field: String, Max Length:11, [0-9]
- address field Max Length:200
- Image field Max length : 1000, should match: http:// or https://

400.description: Bad request:    </br>- name, phone, address, image fields are required!   </br>- Invalid param id type(ObjectId)!!

500.description: Something went wrong! - asked record is found, but it couldn't be updated!

500.description: Something went wrong! - asked record is found, but it couldn't be updated!

- Image field Max length : 1000, should match: http:// or https://

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: At least one of the name, phone, address, image field is required!

- name field Max Length:100

- brandId should exist on brands

404.description: Not found:   </br> - Category not found on categories!   </br> - Brand not found on brands!
